oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Compact broadband U-slot-loaded rectangular microstrip antennas
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DESHMUKH, AA
KUMAR, G
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: patch
u-slot rectangular microstrip antenna
half u-slot rectangular microstrip antenna
stepped u-slot rectangular microstrip antenna
compact microstrip antenna
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A compact variation of a U-slot-loaded rectangular microstrip antenna-a half U-slot (L-shaped slot) loaded rectangular microstrip antenna-is proposed. The bandwidth of a shorted compact square microstrip antenna is increased by cutting a quarter-wavelength step U-slot. (c) 2005 .
